subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Simon Khan of England, who entered the BMW PGA Championship only after receiving an invitation less than 72 hours before it started, won the tournament by a stroke, shooting a five-under-par 66 to come from seven strokes back.
snippet: Simon Khan of England, who entered the BMW PGA Championship only after receiving an invitation less than 72 hours before it started, won the tournament by a stroke, shooting a five-under-par 66 to come from seven strokes back.
